title: Pasta Eating Contest by The Pasta House
description: Test your pasta-eating skills and compete for the ultimate pasta eater trophy

title: Spice Fusion Cooking Demo
description: Watch the talented chefs from Spice Fusion demonstrate their signature dishes and learn some culinary tips.

title: Pizza Tasting Tour by La Pizzeria
description: Embark on a delicious journey to sample a variety of mouthwatering pizzas from La Pizzeria and vote for your favorite.

title: Sushi Rolling Workshop by Sushi Delight
description: Join Sushi Delight's skilled sushi chefs to learn the art of rolling sushi and create your own tasty rolls.

title: Steak Grilling Showdown by The Steakhouse
description: Witness an exciting grilling competition as chefs from The Steakhouse showcase their grilling techniques and creativity.

title: Taco Eating Challenge by Taco Fiesta
description: Take part in a thrilling taco eating challenge organized by Taco Fiesta and see if you can devour the most tacos within a limited time.

title: Café Bistro's Coffee Brewing Masterclass
description: Immerse yourself in the world of coffee as Café Bistro's baristas guide you through the art of brewing the perfect cup of joe.

title: Thai Cuisine Showcase by Thai Paradise
description: Explore the vibrant flavors of Thai cuisine through a live cooking demonstration by the talented chefs of Thai Paradise.

title: Food Truck Rodeo
description: Indulge in a wide array of delectable street foods from various local food trucks, featuring cuisines from all over the world.

title: Dessert Extravaganza
description: Treat your sweet tooth to an assortment of delectable desserts, including pastries, cakes, and ice creams, provided by all participating restaurants.
